${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you change the constructor of your card to use super(cardInfo, true); this will be the card's description when it is upgraded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Vomit.NAME: Vomit
${modID}:Vomit.DESCRIPTION: musclemantot:Purge. NL Deal !D! damage for each musclemantot:Binge lost.

${modID}:CrunchAndMunch.NAME: Crunch and Munch
${modID}:CrunchAndMunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 musclemantot:Binge for each bite played this turn.

${modID}:Spray.NAME: Spray
${modID}:Spray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. X equals an enemy's buffs and debuffs.

${modID}:LitterSplash.NAME: Litter Splash
${modID}:LitterSplash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add !M! *Slimed cards to your discard.

${modID}:BowlOver.NAME: Bowl Over
${modID}:BowlOver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times equal to your musclemantot:Binge.

${modID}:Spew.NAME: Spew
${modID}:Spew.DESCRIPTION: musclemantot:Purge. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Puke.NAME: Puke
${modID}:Puke.DESCRIPTION: musclemantot:Purge. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison for each musclemantot:Binge lost.

${modID}:ChewThrough.NAME: Chew Through
${modID}:ChewThrough.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:BigBite.NAME: Big Bite
${modID}:BigBite.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of this card by your number of musclemantot:Binge. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Regurgitate.NAME: Regurgitate
${modID}:Regurgitate.DESCRIPTION: musclemantot:Purge. NL Deal !D! damage for each musclemantot:Binge lost. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Regurgitate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: musclemantot:Purge. NL Deal !D! damage for each musclemantot:Binge lost.

${modID}:Meow.NAME: Meow
${modID}:Meow.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your binge is less than or equal to !M!. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:SneakABite.NAME: Sneak A Bite
${modID}:SneakABite.DESCRIPTION: Put all Bite cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SneakABite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put all Bite cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Blep.NAME: Blep
${modID}:Blep.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if no attacks have been played this turn. NL Lose 3 Strength this turn. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I already played an #rAttack this turn!

${modID}:SaunterAway.NAME: Saunter Away
${modID}:SaunterAway.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your musclemantot:Binge is !M! or more. NL Escape from a non-boss combat. Receive no rewards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't escape from a boss!
I can't escape with someone behind me!

${modID}:Intimidate.NAME: Intimidate
${modID}:Intimidate.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your musclemantot:Binge is 3 or more. NL Enemy loses 2 Strength. NL Apply 3 Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DeepSlumber.NAME: Deep Slumber
${modID}:DeepSlumber.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! X Block for each musclemantot:Binge gained this combat.

${modID}:BefriendRaccoon.NAME: Befriend Raccoon
${modID}:BefriendRaccoon.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Kneading.NAME: Kneading
${modID}:Kneading.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:Snatch.NAME: Snatch
${modID}:Snatch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to apply a buff, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:PleasantDemeanor.NAME: Pleasant Demeanor
${modID}:PleasantDemeanor.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of combat, raise your Max HP by !M! for each enemy that was defeated.
${modID}:PleasantDemeanor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, raise your Max HP by !M! for each enemy that was defeated.

${modID}:EyeOfTheTotger.NAME: Eye Of The Totger
${modID}:EyeOfTheTotger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block at the end of each turn for each musclemantot:Binge you have.

${modID}:FallFromAmysGrace.NAME: Fall From Amy's Grace
${modID}:FallFromAmysGrace.DESCRIPTION: Strength also increases amount of Poison inflicted.

${modID}:FiveToeDiscount.NAME: Five Toe Discount
${modID}:FiveToeDiscount.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain [E] every time you musclemantot:Binge.

${modID}:GuzzleGut.NAME: Guzzle Gut
${modID}:GuzzleGut.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies each time you musclemantot:Binge.

${modID}:JawVice.NAME: Jaw Vice
${modID}:JawVice.DESCRIPTION: Bite cards cost !M! less [E] to play.
${modID}:JawVice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Bite cards cost !M! less [E] to play.

${modID}:LiquidLaugh.NAME: Liquid Laugh
${modID}:LiquidLaugh.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies each time you musclemantot:Purge.

${modID}:LoafForm.NAME: Loaf Form
${modID}:LoafForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL musclemantot:Binge !M! at the start of every turn.
${modID}:LoafForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: musclemantot:Binge !M! at the start of every turn.

${modID}:PurroteinPowder.NAME: Purrotein Powder
${modID}:PurroteinPowder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength every time you musclemantot:Binge.
${modID}:PurroteinPowder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Strength every time you musclemantot:Binge.
